politicas.item_nueve: How long will my order arrive?
politicas.item_diez: We are everywhere, that's why we make national and international shipments.
politicas.item_once: Lima: from 2 to 5 business days, counting from the business day following the payment of your order. Your order will usually arrive in 2 days in the following districts: Miraflores, San Borja, San Isidro, Surco, Surquillo, Jesús María, Lince, La Victoria, Magdalena, Pueblo Libre and San Miguel.
politicas.item_doce: Province: from 3 to 7 business days, counting from the business day following the payment of your order.
politicas.item_trece: International: our international shipments are made via DHL. The estimated delivery time is 5 to 10 business days, counting from the business day following the payment of your order. These times may vary if the package is held by local authorities or customs.
politicas.item_catorce: The virtual store accepts order entry 24/7, but orders placed after 5:00 p.m. (Peruvian time GMT-5) will be considered as income on the next business day.
politicas.item_quince: Our commitment is to offer you the best shipping service within the established times. If not, please write to us at
politicas.item_dieciocho: The store makes changes only to purchases made in Peruvian territory. To do this, you must write to contacto@domain.com within the first 7 business days of receiving your order, taking into account the following:
politicas.item_diecinueve: 1.The shipping charge for product change will be assumed by the customer.
politicas.item_veinte: 2.The product must be new and without signs of use.
politicas.item_ventiuno: 3.It must be returned with the original tags and packaging in good condition.
politicas.item_ventidos: 4.In case the garment to be purchased is of a lower price, a giftcard will be granted with the remaining amount for use on this website, the following 15 days.
politicas.item_ventitres: 5.We do not make money refunds. Only in specific cases such as: failure to deliver or shipment of product in poor condition.
politicas.item_venticuatro: What do I do if the product I bought has a fault?
politicas.item_venticinco: If you received a product that has a fault, you can request its change within the first 7 business days of receiving your order. In this case, after its evaluation, we will assume the shipping surcharge.
politicas.item_ventiseis: How do I make the change?
politicas.item_ventisiete: Send us an email to contacto@domain.com indicating your change request and your order number.
politicas.item_ventiocho: Your email will be answered within 3 business days maximum.
politicas.item_ventinueve: Send us the product to the address that will be indicated by mail.
politicas.item_treinta: The product will be reviewed and after its evaluation, the change will be made. If there is no available stock, a virtual giftcard will be issued for the value paid for the garment.
politicas.item_treintayuno: *International purchases do not count with changes or returns.*
politicas.item_treintaytres: Enter button title to this page

terminos.dos: Welcome to the virtual store. We invite you to carefully read the terms and conditions on the use of our website.
terminos.cuatro: Registration in our virtual store is free. It is not an essential requirement for the acquisition of products, but it will allow you to make purchases in a personalized and faster way.
terminos.siete: The store offers the following payment options:
terminos.ocho: Payment Market: Visa, MasterCard, Diners and American Express credit and/or debit cards
terminos.doce: Packages shipped internationally (outside of Peru) may be subject to duties and taxes. These amounts are not included in the price of the products or shipping costs. The store is not responsible for the amounts associated with the import. These amounts must be covered by the recipient of the package. The duties and tariffs are established by the customs authorities of each locality, so we recommend that before making a purchase, consult the customs website of your locality for more information.
terminos.catorce: The store is responsible for all the content of this website, as well as any changes that are present. Likewise, all information, data, photographs, graphics, videos or content within this website is the property of the store. Their use without authorization is prohibited, as it violates national and/or international copyright and privacy laws.
terminos.dieciseis: Our database is private and confidential, guaranteeing the personal information of our clients. By accessing our service, the client accepts the terms and conditions set forth above and agrees with them.
venta.ventisite: The transaction code was not found in the sale, make sure it is not a manual sale.
